name: Bring Her Back (Lilith's Child Games Studio)
name_original: Bring Her Back (Lilith's Child Games Studio)
description:
STORY

Dive into this surreal horror world to bring your wife back to life.

A PSX short surreal horror game about grief.

CONTROLS

W, S, D, A & mouse - Movement  
Space - Jump
LMB / E - Interact
